thread.title: Mrs Franks
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by Mrs Franks

author: Mrs Franks
title: Mrs Franks
text: Purchased two oak lamp stands from Hallowood in January 17 from the website. Absolutely delighted with the furniture. It's very well made using lovely wood and fits beautifully in our small cottage (it's difficult to find well-made things for smaller houses). I've since been to the showroom in Banbury to look at the range and I wasn't disappointed. I shall definitely be returning for dining and bedroom furniture in the near future. Your staff in Banbury were very helpful and friendly. Well done!
